languages.text: "Один вид этого... механизма... оскверняет нас. Один миг глупости — и нас ждет вечность проклятия. Ты этого жаждешь, элантах? Мы должны уничтожить его! Пока тьма этого творения не коснулась наших душ".

traits.locale_text: [draft] "Не всякое познание — благо, элантах. Есть тайны, что лучше оставить под покровом забвения".
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: "The very sight of that... mechanism... defiles us. One moment of stupidity will spell an eternity of cursed existence for all of us. Is that what you want, elantach? We must destroy it! Before the darkness of this creation touches our souls."
languages.original_text: "Один вид этого... механизма... оскверняет нас. Один миг глупости — и нас ждет вечность проклятия. Ты этого жаждешь, элантах? Мы должны уничтожить его! Пока тьма этого творения не коснулась наших душ".

traits.locale_text: "The very sight of that... mechanism... defiles us. One moment of stupidity will spell an eternity of cursed existence for us all. Is that what you want, elantach? We must destroy it! Before the darkness of this creation touches our souls."

"The very sight of that... mechanism... defiles us. One moment of stupidity will spell an eternity of cursed existence for all of us. Is that what you want, elantach? We must destroy it! Before the darkness of this creation touches our souls."

languages.text: "Schon der Anblick dieses ... Mechanismus ... besudelt uns. Nur ein Augenblick der Dummheit stürzt uns in eine Ewigkeit der Verdammnis. Wollt Ihr das wirklich, Elantach? Wir müssen ihn zerstören! Bevor die Dunkelheit dieser Schöpfung unsere Seelen berührt."
languages.original_text: "The very sight of that... mechanism... defiles us. One moment of stupidity will spell an eternity of cursed existence for all of us. Is that what you want, elantach? We must destroy it! Before the darkness of this creation touches our souls."

traits.locale_text: "Schon der Anblick dieses ... Mechanismus ... besudelt uns. Nur ein Augenblick der Dummheit stürzt uns in eine Ewigkeit der Verdammnis. Wollt Ihr das wirklich, Elantach? Wir müssen ihn zerstören! Bevor die Dunkelheit dieser Schöpfung unsere Seelen berührt."

languages.text: « La simple vue de ce... mécanisme... nous corrompt. Il suffirait d'un instant d'inattention pour tous nous maudire éternellement. Est-ce vraiment ce que vous voulez, elantach ? Nous devons le détruire ! Avant que les ténèbres de cette création n'atteignent nos âmes. »
languages.original_text: "The very sight of that... mechanism... defiles us. One moment of stupidity will spell an eternity of cursed existence for all of us. Is that what you want, elantach? We must destroy it! Before the darkness of this creation touches our souls."

traits.locale_text: « La simple vue de ce... mécanisme... nous corrompt. Il suffirait d'un instant d'inattention pour tous nous maudire éternellement. Est-ce vraiment ce que vous voulez, elantach ? Nous devons le détruire ! Avant que les ténèbres de cette création n'atteignent nos âmes. »

languages.text: “光是看到那台……装置……就是一种腐蚀。一时的愚行会为我们所有人招致永恒的诅咒。这就是你想要的结果吗，外界人？我们必须把它摧毁！否则这件邪恶造物就会侵蚀我们的灵魂！”
languages.original_text: "The very sight of that... mechanism... defiles us. One moment of stupidity will spell an eternity of cursed existence for all of us. Is that what you want, elantach? We must destroy it! Before the darkness of this creation touches our souls."

traits.locale_text: “光是看到那台……装置……就是一种腐蚀。一时的愚行会为我们所有人招致永恒的诅咒。这就是你想要的结果吗，外界人？我们必须把它摧毁！否则这件邪恶造物就会侵蚀我们的灵魂！”

languages.text: «La mera imagen de ese... mecanismo... es profana. Un momento de estupidez nos condenará a todos a una eternidad de existencia maldita. ¿Es eso lo que quieres, elantach? ¡Debemos destruirlo! Antes de que la oscuridad de esta creación toque nuestras almas».
languages.original_text: "The very sight of that... mechanism... defiles us. One moment of stupidity will spell an eternity of cursed existence for all of us. Is that what you want, elantach? We must destroy it! Before the darkness of this creation touches our souls."

traits.locale_text: «La mera imagen de ese... mecanismo... es profana. Un momento de estupidez nos condenará a todos a una eternidad de existencia maldita. ¿Es eso lo que quieres, elantach? ¡Debemos destruirlo! Antes de que la oscuridad de esta creación toque nuestras almas».

languages.text: 「その…機械を目にするだけで穢される。一瞬の愚行が、私たちすべてに呪われた永遠の運命をもたらすのだ。それが望みか、エランタ？この忌まわしき創造物の闇が私たちの魂に触れる前に、これを破壊しなければならない！」
languages.original_text: "The very sight of that... mechanism... defiles us. One moment of stupidity will spell an eternity of cursed existence for all of us. Is that what you want, elantach? We must destroy it! Before the darkness of this creation touches our souls."

traits.locale_text: 「その…機械を目にするだけで穢される。一瞬の愚行が、私たちすべてに呪われた永遠の運命をもたらすのだ。それが望みか、エランタ？この忌まわしき創造物の闇が私たちの魂に触れる前に、これを破壊しなければならない！」

languages.text: "O mekanizmanın... Görüntüsü bile bizi kirletiyor. Bir anlık aptallık, hepimiz için ebediyen lanetli bir varoluşa yol açacak. İstediğin bu mu elantach? Bu icadın karanlığı ruhlarımıza dokunmadan önce onu yok etmeliyiz!"
languages.original_text: "The very sight of that... mechanism... defiles us. One moment of stupidity will spell an eternity of cursed existence for all of us. Is that what you want, elantach? We must destroy it! Before the darkness of this creation touches our souls."

traits.locale_text: "O mekanizmanın... Görüntüsü bile bizi kirletiyor. Bir anlık aptallık hepimiz için ebediyen lanetli bir varoluşa yol açacak. İstediğin bu mu elantach? Bu icadın karanlığı ruhlarımıza dokunmadan önce onu yok etmeliyiz!"
